videoSnippet.title: Wait Till You See This Checkmate
videoSnippet.description:
Learn the Evans Gambit here! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CUQQ4dym5ZU

Photos by Lenart Ootes
Have a great day :)

Nihal Sarin (2705) - Giri, Anish (2792) 
Nihal Sarin vs. Giri | Speed Chess | Ro16 (chess24.com) [1] 2022.12.07
D94 Gruenfeld, Opovcensky variation

1.d4 Nf6 2.c4 g6 3.Nc3 d5 4.Nf3 Bg7 5.e3 O-O 6.Bd2 c5 7.dxc5 Na6 8.cxd5 Nxc5 9.Bc4 a6 10.a4 Bf5 11.O-O Rc8 12.Qe2 Nce4 13.Rfd1 Ng4 14.Nxe4 Bxe4 15.Ng5 Bf5 16.e4 Qc7 17.d6 Qxc4 18.Qxc4 Rxc4 19.dxe7 Re8 20.exf5 Bd4 21.Bc3 Bxf2+ 22.Kf1 Bb6 23.fxg6 Rf4+ 24.Ke2 Rxe7+ 25.Kd3 hxg6 26.Re1 Rd7+ 27.Kc2 Ne3+ 28.Kb3 f6 29.g3 Rf5 30.Ne4 Kf7 31.Re2 Ba7 32.Rae1 Ng4 33.Nd6+ Rxd6 34.Re7+ Kg8 35.Re8+ Kg7 36.R1e7+ Kh6 37.Rh8+ Kg5 38.h4#

00:00 Hello Everyone!
00:55  Game Starts!
03:45 Completely New Game!
07:45 Pause the Video!
09:15 It was in This Position
10:45 Contributions

The Tata Steel Chess India Rapid tournament is a 10-player round-robin taking place from 29 November to 1 December 2022 in the National Library of India in Kolkata.

Players receive 25 minutes for the entire game, plus a 10-second increment starting from move one. Official website: tatasteelchess.in

judgment.name: Blunder
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. Kg7 was best.
